title.value: Winter triticale: breeding, seed production, cultivation technology
Озимое тритикале: селекция, семеноводство, технология возделывания

person.name: Timoshchenko, V.G., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied breeding, seed production, cultivation technology of winter triticale (Triticosecale). The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there were described the results of research, summarized the theory and practice to develop a genetic basis, the principles and techniques of creating a new source material. The formative process and the laws of inheritance of economically useful traits and properties using intraspecific, hybridization and selection intravarietal to increase the potential and actual productivity of varieties, increase lodging resistance and adverse environmental factors, tolerance to major diseases were shown. The questions of winter triticale cultivation technology on resource-saving technology were considered.
